column5: in 2008 sent me emails promising me wealth, health etc... if I would simply forward the emails to 5-15-30 of my contacts. Well, IT DID'T WORK!  So, for 2009, would you be kind enough to just send me gift certificates, chocolates, beer, cash, fishing tackle...anything?  Thanks.
You dont have to worry about me sending you that garbage Roy, I like you just the way you are!
Hmmmmmm. They always work for me Roy. Thats why I am a multi - Billionare and will live to be 150. Keep trying!!
